messages.title: A UNIQUE AND CRUCIAL ELECTION FOR OUR COUNTRY
messages.content: By going to Brussels with a strong negotiating hand I can ensure we guarantee our economic security.

messages.title: NATIONAL INTEREST SUCCESS IS CENTRAL TO OUR MAKING BREXIT A SUCCESS
messages.content: Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest - and it is central to your own security and prosperity.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure economic security and prosperity by negotiating a good Brexit deal.
Guarantee economic security by going to Brussels with a strong negotiating hand.
Provide strong and stable leadership to take the right decisions for Britain.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The leaflet implies a tactical situation by emphasizing that 'every single vote will count' and references the local constituency's potential influence on the Brexit negotiation and avoiding a coalition of chaos.

issues.brexitEurope: Making Brexit a success is vital, ensure guarantee of economic security through strong Brexit deal negotiation.
issues.economy: Ensure economic security through strong Brexit deal negotiation.

endorsements.endorsement: Theresa May urges to vote for Ryan Stephenson, emphasizing strong and stable leadership and economic security through Brexit.

quotes.text: Labour plots Brexit deal with others if Tories don't win election majority.

images.caption: Leaflet page showing a message from Rt Hon Theresa May Prime Minister supporting Ryan Stephenson.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet is addressed to a voter named Benjamin Dalton, emphasizing the personal nature of political outreach.
